name: Single filer at median income in Zürich
description: Standard case for single person earning CHF 80,000 in Zürich canton

sources.description: Calculated using official 2024 federal tax brackets from PWC Tax Summaries
sources.notes: Federal tax calculated on taxable income (gross minus social contributions minus standard deductions of CHF 5,000). Federal tax ~980 CHF, Cantonal/Municipal ~12% of gross for Zurich mid-income, Social 6.4%
